ComicInfo.Summary: Nova travels to Asgard with Thor, where they learn that Odin has been replaced by an impostor, and have to fight a troll army alongside Valkyrie. After being rescued, Odin reveals that one of the Avengers is also an impostor.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:36:16. [Issue ID 785661]
ComicInfo.Characters: the Norns,Avengers [Nova,Captain America,Valkyrie,Thor,Invisible Woman,Odin,Heimdall (cameo),Trrthen,Iron Man,Black Widow]
